crime_dataset.description: Individual crime and anti-social behaviour incidents, updated monthly.

columns.name: Crime_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the crime.

columns.name: Month
columns.description: Year and month of the crime.

columns.name: Reported_by
columns.description: The force that provided the data about the crime.

columns.name: Falls_within
columns.description: The force in whose jurisdiction the crime occurred (same as Reported_by).

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the approximate crime location.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the approximate crime location.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Approximate location of crime at street level.

columns.name: LSOA_code
columns.description: Lower Layer Super Output Area code of the anonymised point.

columns.name: LSOA_name
columns.description: Lower Layer Super Output Area name of the anonymised point.

columns.name: Crime_type
columns.description: Category of the crime.

columns.name: Last_outcome_category
columns.description: Most recent outcome associated with the crime.

columns.name: Context
columns.description: Optional field for forces to provide additional human-readable data (often empty).

stop_and_search_dataset.description: Individual stop and search records, updated monthly.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Subject of the search (category).

columns.name: Date
columns.description: Date and time of the stop-and-search event (time may default to 00:00:00).

columns.name: Part_of_a_policing_operation
columns.description: Whether the stop-and-search was part of a policing operation.

columns.name: Policing_operation
columns.description: The name of the operation (often empty).

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the approximate stop-and-search location.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the approximate stop-and-search location.

columns.name: Gender
columns.description: Gender of the person stopped.

columns.name: Age_range
columns.description: Age range of the person stopped.

columns.name: Self_defined_ethnicity
columns.description: Self-defined ethnicity of the person stopped.

columns.name: Officer_defined_ethnicity
columns.description: Officer-defined ethnicity of the person stopped.

columns.name: Legislation
columns.description: The legal power used for the stop-and-search.

columns.name: Object_of_search
columns.description: Reason for carrying out the stop-and-search.

columns.name: Outcome
columns.description: The outcome of the stop.

columns.name: Outcome_linked_to_object_of_search
columns.description: Whether the outcome was related to the reason for the stop (nullable).

columns.name: Removal_of_more_than_outer_clothing
columns.description: Whether more than outer clothing was removed during the search (nullable).

notes: CSV and API data structures may differ slightly. API datasets can include additional variables not listed here, and may omit some listed ones.
